title: It's Time (Android Wear Face)
summary: Fully customisable watch face which displays the time in phrase format!
description: An Android Wear watch face that displays the time in phrase format.e.g "It is about twenty to four".The watch face is fully customisable with the accompanying mobile app. Even the font can be changed.Note: Unlocking customisations requires an in-app purchase.
descriptionHTML:
An Android Wear watch face that displays the time in phrase format.

e.g "It is about twenty to four".

The watch face is fully customisable with the accompanying mobile app. Even the font can be changed.

Note: Unlocking customisations requires an in-app purchase.
comments: Great Idea, Great look. Meh, I just like knowing the exact time.  Not for me.
